page.title: 17Tourism, Rosneath
page.content: A caravan park is at the toe of the Rosneath Peninsula on the site of Rosneath Castle, former home of Duke of Argyll & Princess Louise. Its pet- rol station is only one in Rosneath and supplies Thames four star petrol. The play park has paddling pool,swing slide, springy horse, climbing frame, play house and sand. There is Residen- tial Park with 50 all-year-round vans. There is food store and shop with camping equipment. During the summer and other holidays there are many holiday-makers who come from all over Scotland and further afield. The park also has sailing club as many caravan owners also have boats.
